channel.title: Donator chest

item.title: Donator chest
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[code=Java] case 4253:
if (playerHasItemAmount(995, 500000000) {
c.playerRights = 6; //donater rank
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now a Donater");
} else {

                    sM("Sorry you need 500m to become a donater");
                    sM("go get some more money");
    }

[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Donator chest
item.dc:creator: @deershoot3r deershoot3r
item.description:
@deershoot3r wrote:

im trying to add a donator chest for people to pay in-game money to, to become donator but im messed around with the code that mad_moparscapian gave me but still no luck, can someone help me im on delta and would really like to get this working. here is my code

case 4253: if (playerHasItemAmount(995, 500000000) c.playerRights = 6; //donater rank c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now a Donater"); { else if (playerHasItemAmount(995, 499999999) } sM("Sorry you need 500m to become a donater"); sM("go get some more money"); } }

Read full topic
